title: To the Team Responsible for Mecha Kingdoms Jax
body:
Now _that _ is mecha.

Awesome design.

Amazing animations.

Excellent effects.

And attention to detail.

I applaud your work.

replies.body: Thank you! I wrote his voice lines. Hope you dig them!

> [{quoted}](name=SkiptoMyLuo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KZPP8IFP,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-12-12T23:28:57.291+0000)
>
> Thank you! I wrote his voice lines. Hope you dig them!

Did you work on Sett as well?

I worked a tiny bit on base Sett's lore in the early days but the lead writer was JohnODyin. Mecha Kingdoms Sett lore was done by me, but since he's not a Legendary skin, he doesn't have new voice lines. A couple of my pitches for voice lines for the base did sneak through, thanks to John :)

> [{quoted}](name=SkiptoMyLuo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KZPP8IFP,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2020-01-06T23:06:17.143+0000)
>
> I worked a tiny bit on base Sett's lore in the early days but the lead writer was JohnODyin. Mecha Kingdoms Sett lore was done by me, but since he's not a Legendary skin, he doesn't have new voice lines. A couple of my pitches for voice lines for the base did sneak through, thanks to John :)

OOOO which ones are yours? I honestly love most of his lines. I found the Bruce Lee reference funny. Also, any idea why no event for these skins? The teaser video with the dragon really hinted and pointed to one, but nothing. Also the lone refers to a wolf, so is Sett part Wolf in the skin? or was that just an expression. You guys have been tight lipped on what animals he is part of.

Any chance we can get a toggle-able wingless option for this skin post 6? I love this skin, but I think the model actually looks better without the wings on his back that you get once you level his ultimate

> [{quoted}](name=SkiptoMyLuo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KZPP8IFP,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-12-12T23:28:57.291+0000)
>
> Thank you! I wrote his voice lines. Hope you dig them!

You did very well with making him still sound like Jax but in a new way.
why is this so downvoted omg

> [{quoted}](name=XElite109,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KZPP8IFP,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2020-01-08T02:00:28.461+0000)
>
> why is this so downvoted omg

Bots found it soon after creation

Because who needed a Jax skin? 

Does mr. Eggplant hands not count as monstrous and ugly enough for Riot's "too hard to make skins for, so we'll ignore them forever except to give one random skin after 3 years that took us 5 minutes to make and oops we're ignoring feedba-- I mean, no trolling in the comments please :(" 

Unless theyre subtly calling Jax players rats, the way Lux got a skin in year of the dog.
its the year of the rat and no twitch skin my disappointment is immeasurable and my day is ruined.{{champion:29}}
Where did all the negative votes come from??

Downvote bots.

No one gives a shit about em so whatevs

Moderators are more concerned about less significant things
Jax's special effects and visual effects as well as two seperate forms are good enough for him to be an ultimate skin in my book.
I think the whole Mecha Kingdoms skin line is amazing. I mean Mecha Sett is amazing looking.

Wholeheartedly agree.
I don't play Jax (I rarely play league tbh, waiting for their other games), but DAMN. That is one nice skin. Must have been a lot of work to get all the details right.
